ESX_HOST.description: This is the upgrade bundle for VMware ESXi 8.0U1a. Additional Information: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u1a-release-notes/index.html Important: Review VMware Compatibility Guide for hardware and firmware compatibility before starting the upgrade.
This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains VMware ESXi 8.0 Update 1c. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u1c-release-notes/index.html
This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains VMware ESXi 8.0 Update 1d. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u1d-release-notes/index.html
The upgrade bundle for VMware ESXi 8.0 Update 2. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-802-release-notes/index.html
This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains VMware ESXi 8.0 Update 2b. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u2b-release-notes/index.html
This VMware Software Upgrade contains ESXi 8.0 U2c. For more information, please see - https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u2c-release-notes/index.html

This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains vSphere ESXI 80U2d, for more information, refer https://techdocs.broadcom.com/us/en/vmware-cis/vsphere/vsphere/8-0/release-notes/esxi-update-and-patch-release-notes/vsphere-esxi-80u2d-release-notes.html.

The upgrade bundle for VMware ESXi 8.0.3. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0.3/rn/vsphere-esxi-803-release-notes.html.
This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains VMware ESXi 8.0 Update 3b. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u3b-release-notes/index.html
This VMware Software Upgrade contains VMware vSphere ESXi 8.0 U3c  For more information, please see - https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-esxi-80u3c-release-notes/index.html

VCENTER.description: This is the install bundle for VMware vCenter Server 8.0U1a. Additional Information: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-vcenter-server-80u1a-release-notes/index.html Important: Review https://kb.vmware.com/s/article/91666 before starting the upgrade.

This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains vCenter Server 8.0 Update 1b. Customers should NOT run vCenter upgrades in parallel as it is not-supported for vCenters running in ELM mode. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-vcenter-server-80u1b-release-notes/index.html

This VMware Software Upgrade bundle contains vCenter Server 8.0 Update 1c. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-vcenter-server-80u1c-release-notes/index.html

This VMware Software Upgrade contains VC 8.0 U1e. For more information, please see - https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/8.0/rn/vsphere-vcenter-server-80u1e-release-notes/index.html

NSX_T_MANAGER.description: This is the upgrade bundle for VMware NSX 4.1.0.2.0. Additional information: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-NSX/4.1.0.2/rn/vmware-nsx-4102-release-notes/index.html Important: Review VMware Compatibility Guide for hardware and firmware compatibility before starting the upgrade.
The install bundle for VMware NSX Data Center 4.1.1.0.

The upgrade bundle for VMware NSX Data Center 4.1.2.1.0. Customers are strongly encouraged to run the NSX Upgrade Evaluation Tool. For more information, see https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-NSX/4.1.2.1/rn/vmware-nsx-4121-release-notes/index.html
